BillTitle: An Act to amend the Criminal Code, the Official Secrets Act, the Canada Evidence Act, the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) Act and other Acts, and to enact measures respecting the registration of charities in order to combat terrorism
Information:
Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby fixes December 24, 2001 as the day on which that Act, other than sections 52, 54 to 64, subsections 67(2) and (3) and section 74, comes into force.

SI/2002-16





Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby fixes June 12, 2002, as the day on which section 52, subsections 67(2) and (3) and section 74 of that Act come into force.


SI/2002-86





Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby fixes January 6, 2003 as the day on which sections 54 to 64 of that Act come into force.


SI/2002-164
Committee: The Special Senate Committee on Bill C-36
